Source code for havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.storage.storage_generic

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

from .smart_validation_abstract import SmartValidationAbstract
from ..autoval import AutovalUtils



[docs]class StorageGeneric(SmartValidationAbstract):
    """
    Generic storage device class which is used if no other supported storage
    device is found.
    """

[docs]    def __init__(self, device, external_json=None):
        self.blockname = device
        self.data = self.get_data(device)



[docs]    def get_data(self, device):
        data = {}
        data['logical_drive'] = device
        data['manufacturer'] = 'Unknown'
        data['serial_number'] = ""
        data['type'] = 'generic'
        data['interface'] = 'Unknown'
        AutovalUtils.log_info("WARNING !!! - Device Interface not identified")
        return data



[docs]    def validate_results(self):
        return



[docs]    def validate_rules(self, data):
        # Generic storage devices currently have no rules to verify
        return True



[docs]    def to_config_dict(self, data):
        return super(StorageGeneric, self).to_config_dict(data)



[docs]    def compare_attributes(
        self, smart_data_before, smart_data_after, devices, json_data
    ):
        return
